module.name: default
module.configure:
case "${SB_SYSTYPE}" in *-aix*) CC=xlc CFLAGS="-O2 -qro -qroconst -qmaxmem=-1 -qarch=ppc" CXX=xlC CXXFLAGS="-O2 -qro -qroconst -qnotempinc \ -qnotemplateregistry -qmaxmem=-1 -qarch=ppc" LDFLAGS="-Wl,-brtl -Wl,-blibpath:/usr/lib" CC_LD_RT="-Wl,-blibpath:" ;; ia64*-hpux*) CC=cc CFLAGS="-z +O2 +Ofltacc +Olit=all +Oentrysched \ +Odataprefetch +Onolimit" CXX=aCC CXXFLAGS="-AA -z +O2 +Ofltacc +Olit=all +Oentrysched \ +Odataprefetch +Onolimit" CC_LD_RT="-Wl,+b," ;; *-hpux11.[01]*) CC=cc CFLAGS="-z +O2 +Onofltacc +Olit=all +DAportable \ +Oentrysched +Odataprefetch +Onolimit" CXX=aCC CXXFLAGS="-AA -z +O2 +Onofltacc +Olit=all +DAportable \ +Oentrysched +Odataprefetch +Onolimit" CC_LD_RT="-Wl,+s,+b," ;; *-hpux*) CC=cc CFLAGS="-z +O2 +Onofltacc +Olit=all +Oentrysched \ +Odataprefetch +Onolimit" CXX=aCC CXXFLAGS="-AA -z +O2 +Onofltacc +Olit=all +Oentrysched \ +Odataprefetch +Onolimit" CC_LD_RT="-Wl,+s,+b," ;; *-irix*) CC=cc CFLAGS="-Wl,-woff,84 -Wl,-woff,85 -woff 1009,1429 \ -use_readonly_const -G0 -rdata_shared -DEBUG:optimize_space=ON \ -O2 -OPT:Olimit=0" CXX=CC CXXFLAGS="-Wl,-woff,84 -Wl,-woff,85 -woff 1429 \ -use_readonly_const -G0 -rdata_shared -DEBUG:optimize_space=ON \ -ptused -FE:template_in_elf_section -O2 -OPT:Olimit=0" CC_LD_RT="-Wl,-rpath," ;; i?86*-linux*) CFLAGS="-O2 -mtune=pentiumpro -march=pentiumpro" CXXFLAGS="-O2 -mtune=pentiumpro -march=pentiumpro" CC_LD_RT="-Wl,-rpath," ;; *-linux*) CC_LD_RT="-Wl,-rpath," ;; *-osf*) CC=cc CFLAGS="-O2 -arch ev5 -msym -readonly_strings" CXX=cxx CXXFLAGS="-O2 -arch ev5 -model ansi -msym \ -readonly_strings -timplicit_local -D__USE_STD_IOSTREAM" CC_LD_RT="-Wl,-rpath," ;; i?86*-solaris*) CC=cc CFLAGS="-mr -Qn -xstrconst -xO2 -xtarget=pentium4" CXX=CC CXXFLAGS="-xO2 -xtarget=pentium4" CC_LD_RT="-R" ;; *-solaris2.8) CC=cc CFLAGS="-mr -Qn -xstrconst -xO2 -xtarget=ultra2 \ -xarch=v8plusa" CXX=CC CXXFLAGS="-xO2 -xtarget=ultra2 -xarch=v8plusa" CC_LD_RT="-R" ;; *-solaris*) CC=cc CFLAGS="-mr -Qn -xstrconst -xO2 -xtarget=ultra2 \ -m32 -xarch=sparcvis" CXX=CC CXXFLAGS="-xO2 -xtarget=ultra2 -m32 -xarch=sparcvis" CC_LD_RT="-R" ;; esac
${SHELL} ./configure CC="${CC:-gcc}" CXX="${CXX:-g++}" \ CFLAGS="${CFLAGS:--O2}" CXXFLAGS="${CXXFLAGS:--O2}" \ LDFLAGS="${SB_VAR_GCC_RT+-L${SB_VAR_GCC_RT_LIB} \ ${CC_LD_RT}${SB_VAR_GCC_RT_LIB}} \ ${SB_VAR_FCPACKAGE+-L${SB_VAR_FCPACKAGE_LIB}} \ ${LDFLAGS+${LDFLAGS}}" \ PKG_CONFIG_PATH="${SB_VAR_FCPACKAGE+${SB_VAR_FCPACKAGE_LIB}/pkgconfig:}\ ${SB_VAR_LIBGLIB+${_libglib_lib:-${SB_VAR_LIBGLIB_LIB}}/pkgconfig:}\ ${SB_VAR_LIBGDKPIXBUF+${SB_VAR_LIBGDKPIXBUF_LIB}/pkgconfig:}\ ${SB_VAR_LIBGTK+${SB_VAR_LIBGTK_LIB}/pkgconfig:}\ ${SB_VAR_LIBPANGO+${SB_VAR_LIBPANGO_LIB}/pkgconfig:}\ ${SB_VAR_LIBCAIRO+${SB_VAR_LIBCAIRO_LIB}/pkgconfig:}\ ${SB_VAR_LIBATK+${SB_VAR_LIBATK_LIB}/pkgconfig:}\ ${SB_VAR_LIBTTF+${SB_VAR_LIBTTF_LIB}/pkgconfig:}\ ${SB_VAR_GETTEXT+${SB_VAR_GETTEXT_LIB}/pkgconfig:}\ ${SB_VAR_LIBPNG+${SB_VAR_LIBPNG_LIB}/pkgconfig:}\ ${SB_VAR_LIBICONV+${SB_VAR_LIBICONV_LIB}/pkgconfig:}\ ${SB_VAR_ZLIB+${SB_VAR_ZLIB_LIB}/pkgconfig}" \ --with-gtk --datadir=${_datadir} --disable-dependency-tracking \ --libdir=${_libdir:-${SB_INSTALL_PREFIX_LIB}} \ --prefix=${SB_INSTALL_PREFIX}
gmake configure
${SB_PATH_SED} -i -e "\ s!-L\(\${libdir}\) !-L\1 ${CC_LD_RT}\1 !" \ base/aiksaurus-1.0.pc gtk/gaiksaurus-1.0.pc

module.name: rtti
module.configure:
case "${SB_SYSTYPE}" in *-aix*) CC=xlc CFLAGS="-O2 -qro -qroconst -qmaxmem=-1 -qarch=ppc" CXX=xlC CXXFLAGS="-O2 -qrtti -qro -qroconst -qnotempinc \ -qnotemplateregistry -qmaxmem=-1 -qarch=ppc" LDFLAGS="-Wl,-brtl -Wl,-blibpath:/usr/lib" CC_LD_RT="-Wl,-blibpath:" ;; esac
${SHELL} ./configure CC="${CC:-gcc}" CXX="${CXX:-g++}" \ CFLAGS="${CFLAGS:--O2}" CXXFLAGS="${CXXFLAGS:--O2}" \ LDFLAGS="${SB_VAR_FCPACKAGE+-L${SB_VAR_FCPACKAGE_LIB}} \ ${LDFLAGS+${LDFLAGS}}" \ PKG_CONFIG_PATH="${SB_VAR_FCPACKAGE+${SB_VAR_FCPACKAGE_LIB}/pkgconfig:}\ ${SB_VAR_LIBGLIB+${_libglib_lib:-${SB_VAR_LIBGLIB_LIB}}/pkgconfig:}\ ${SB_VAR_LIBGDKPIXBUF+${SB_VAR_LIBGDKPIXBUF_LIB}/pkgconfig:}\ ${SB_VAR_LIBGTK+${SB_VAR_LIBGTK_LIB}/pkgconfig:}\ ${SB_VAR_LIBPNG+${SB_VAR_LIBPNG_LIB}/pkgconfig:}\ ${SB_VAR_LIBPANGO+${SB_VAR_LIBPANGO_LIB}/pkgconfig:}\ ${SB_VAR_LIBCAIRO+${SB_VAR_LIBCAIRO_LIB}/pkgconfig:}\ ${SB_VAR_LIBATK+${SB_VAR_LIBATK_LIB}/pkgconfig:}\ ${SB_VAR_LIBTTF+${SB_VAR_LIBTTF_LIB}/pkgconfig:}\ ${SB_VAR_GETTEXT+${SB_VAR_GETTEXT_LIB}/pkgconfig:}\ ${SB_VAR_LIBICONV+${SB_VAR_LIBICONV_LIB}/pkgconfig:}\ ${SB_VAR_ZLIB+${SB_VAR_ZLIB_LIB}/pkgconfig}" \ --with-gtk --datadir=${_datadir} --disable-dependency-tracking \ --libdir="${SB_INSTALL_PREFIX_LIB}/rtti" \ --prefix=${SB_INSTALL_PREFIX}
gmake configure
${SB_PATH_SED} -i -e "\ s!-L\(\${libdir}\) !-L\1 ${CC_LD_RT}\1 !" \ base/aiksaurus-1.0.pc gtk/gaiksaurus-1.0.pc
module.install: gmake -C base install-libLTLIBRARIES install-pkgconfigDATA gmake -C gtk install-pkgconfigDATA gmake -C gtk/src install-libLTLIBRARIES

module.name: gcc44
module.configure:
case "${SB_SYSTYPE}" in *-aix*) CFLAGS="-O2 -mcpu=powerpc" CXXFLAGS="-O2 -mcpu=powerpc" LDFLAGS="-Wl,-brtl -Wl,-blibpath:/usr/lib" CC_LD_RT="-Wl,-blibpath:" ;; ia64*-hpux*) CC_LD_RT="-Wl,+b," ;; *-hpux*) CC_LD_RT="-Wl,+s,+b," ;; i?86*-linux*|i?86-suse-linux*) CFLAGS="-O2 -mtune=pentiumpro -march=pentiumpro" CXXFLAGS="-O2 -mtune=pentiumpro -march=pentiumpro" CC_LD_RT="-Wl,-rpath," ;; *-irix*|*-linux*) CC_LD_RT="-Wl,-rpath," ;; *-osf*) CFLAGS="-O2 -mcpu=ev5" CXXFLAGS="-O2 -mcpu=ev5" CC_LD_RT="-Wl,-rpath," ;; i?86*-solaris*) CFLAGS="-O2 -mtune=pentium4 -march=pentium4" CXXFLAGS="-O2 -mtune=pentium4 -march=pentium4" CC_LD_RT="-R" ;; *-solaris*) CFLAGS="-O2 -mcpu=ultrasparc -mvis" CXXFLAGS="-O2 -mcpu=ultrasparc -mvis" CC_LD_RT="-R" ;; esac
${SHELL} ./configure CC="${CC:-gcc}" CXX="${CXX:-g++}" \ CFLAGS="${CFLAGS:--O2}" CXXFLAGS="${CXXFLAGS:--O2}" \ LDFLAGS="${SB_VAR_GCC_RT+-L${SB_VAR_GCC_RT_LIB} \ ${CC_LD_RT}${SB_VAR_GCC_RT_LIB}} -L${SB_VAR_FCPACKAGE_LIB} \ -L${SB_VAR_LIBPANGO_LIB} -L${SB_VAR_LIBGTK_LIB} \ ${LDFLAGS+${LDFLAGS}}" \ PKG_CONFIG_PATH="${SB_VAR_FCPACKAGE_LIB}/pkgconfig:\ ${SB_VAR_LIBGLIB_LIB}/${_gcc_subdir}/pkgconfig:\ ${SB_VAR_LIBGDKPIXBUF+${SB_VAR_LIBGDKPIXBUF_LIB}/pkgconfig:}\ ${SB_VAR_LIBGTK_LIB}/pkgconfig:\ ${SB_VAR_LIBPNG+${SB_VAR_LIBPNG_LIB}/pkgconfig:}\ ${SB_VAR_ZLIB+${SB_VAR_ZLIB_LIB}/pkgconfig:}\ ${SB_VAR_LIBPANGO_LIB}/pkgconfig:${SB_VAR_LIBCAIRO_LIB}/pkgconfig:\ ${SB_VAR_LIBATK_LIB}/pkgconfig:${SB_VAR_LIBTTF_LIB}/pkgconfig:\ ${SB_VAR_GETTEXT_LIB}/pkgconfig" --with-gtk --datadir=${_datadir} \ --disable-dependency-tracking \ --libdir="${SB_INSTALL_PREFIX_LIB}/${_gcc_subdir}" \ --prefix=${SB_INSTALL_PREFIX}
gmake configure
${SB_PATH_SED} -i -e "\ s!-L\(\${libdir}\) !-L\1 ${CC_LD_RT}\1 !" \ base/aiksaurus-1.0.pc gtk/gaiksaurus-1.0.pc
module.install: gmake -C base install-libLTLIBRARIES install-pkgconfigDATA gmake -C gtk install-pkgconfigDATA gmake -C gtk/src install-libLTLIBRARIES

note.para: Versions of the library for the vendor C++ compiler and GCC is available in the following directories:

platform.name: HP-UX 11.00
platform.para: Patch PHSS_22543 providing the libstd_v2 Standard C++ library is required as the HP C++ compiler was used.

platform.name: Tru64 UNIX 5.1
platform.para: The latest C++ runtime library is required due to the usage of the latest Compaq C++ compiler. It is available from the following locations:

item.para: package CXXREDIST651V37.tar in the support directory of the CD
Remove support for AIX 4.3, Solaris 6 and 7, and HP-UX 10
Remove support for RHEL 3 and SLES 10
Place fcpackage path first in PKG_CONFIG_PATH to override system version
Create native libraries for AIX 5, HP-UX 11.x, IRIX, Solaris, Tru64 UNIX 5.1
Install libAiksaurusGTK for gcc32 and gcc34 modules
Add gcc32 module for gcc-3.3.2 based compile and a gcc34 module for a gcc-3.4.3 based compile.
